description: Check for free and paid-for software recognised by HMRC that you can use to report PAYE information online.

details.body:
Choosing software

Before choosing payroll software you should find out how to get your business ready to employ staff.

This payroll software is recognised by HMRC. You can use it to report PAYE to us online.

You should consider which features you need and check the software you choose has those features.

HMRC cannot recommend one product or service over another. We’re also not responsible for any problems you have with software you’ve bought.

Free payroll software

This free payroll software is recognised by HMRC for businesses with fewer than 10 employees.

Supplier’s name Products
1st Money 1st FREE Payroll & HR
Accentra Technologies Primo Payroll with Auto Enrolment (up to 10 employees)
Collegia Partners Limited Free Payroll

Hartigan Software Design RTI Lite
HMRC Basic PAYE Tools

IRIS Software IRIS Payroll Basics
Shape Payroll Shape Payroll (up to 3 employees)
Stansoft Stansoft Linux
